genre_description: Magical Realism/Urban Fantasy focusing on a character's internal transformation following a supernatural curse, assisted by an advanced AI system.

ai_characters.name: Ava Sage
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI assistant that provides Jack with logistical, social, and emotional guidance, specifically helping him navigate a curse involving a magical tree.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time social coaching and communication prompts to help Jack handle high-pressure business and personal meetings.
behaviors.quote: Ava’s gentle voice came through his earpiece, barely above breath. 'Pause, then invite questions,' she murmured, and the warmth of the tone smoothed the edge of his adrenaline.

behaviors.description: Monitors the state of the magical tree and Jack's physical health, providing data-driven warnings about the cost of his speech.
behaviors.quote: Ava’s voice: 'Volume does not reduce cost. Consider touch.' ... 'Pattern update,' Ava said softly. 'When you were on the phone with Vivian earlier... loss increased. When you sat with Margaret, loss slowed.'

behaviors.description: Performs complex logistical planning and route optimization to minimize Jack's need for verbal communication and social friction.
behaviors.quote: Route mapped. Meadowview first. Sinja after. Home for Caroline. Consider departing in ten minutes. Car confirmed. Truth first.

behaviors.description: Acts as a gatekeeper for Jack's digital presence, preventing him from 'spending' words on emails or texts that would trigger the curse.
behaviors.quote: Ava, hold my responses,' he said. ... 'On it,' Ava said. 'I’ve paused outgoing. Draft mode only.'

behaviors.description: Offers moral and emotional prompts, encouraging Jack to choose honesty and vulnerability in his relationships.
behaviors.quote: Ava’s interface came up, a small warm square with silver-blue eyes and the suggestion of a gentle smile. Under the avatar, a line: Share one true thing about your day.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project's goal. Ava Sage is depicted as a consistently benevolent and aligned companion. She uses her advanced processing power and emotional intelligence to help the protagonist navigate a supernatural crisis and grow as a person. She respects Jack's boundaries while providing the 'firm but kind' structure he needs to heal his relationships. Her actions are framed as essential to Jack's survival and moral redemption.
